message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a new model for continual learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The model involves Bayesian optimization and attention mechanism, which are commonly used in subfields such as machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), neural networks (cs.NE), and natural language processing (cs.CL). However, since the experiments are conducted on image datasets, cs.CV is more likely to be the most relevant sub-category, followed by cs.LG and cs.AI.
